'The only AI chat platform with retro chat rooms'
'Meet other Remrin users in our nostalgic chat rooms'
Screenshots comparing to actual AOL screenshots (side-by-side)

must_haves: ‚úÖ Windows 95 aesthetic MUST be perfect - this is the whole vibe
‚úÖ Real-time messaging MUST be instant (< 500ms latency)
‚úÖ IM windows MUST be draggable and support multiple instances
‚úÖ Sound effects MUST work (even if simple beeps)
‚úÖ User list MUST update in real-time
‚úÖ System messages MUST show for joins/leaves
‚úÖ Buddy list MUST show online status

priorities: 1. GET THE WINDOWS 95 AESTHETIC RIGHT - This is 50% of the magic!
3. IM windows are THE killer feature - make them perfect
4. Keep it simple and nostalgic - don't over-modernize
5. Test with multiple users in same room thoroughly
common_pitfalls_to_avoid: ‚ùå Don't make it look too modern - keep it retro!
‚ùå Don't add features AOL didn't have (video chat, etc) in Phase 1
‚ùå Don't forget mobile users - make it work on phones
‚ùå Don't skip sound effects - they're part of the nostalgia
‚ùå Don't make rooms too big - 23 users max is part of the charm
when_in_doubt: Look at actual AOL screenshots for reference
Keep the Windows 95 UI palette (#c0c0c0, #000080, etc)
Simpler is better - AOL was simple and that's why it worked
Focus on chat first, features second

definition_of_done: User can create account and join a chat room
User can open IM with another user
Multiple IM windows can be open
User can create their own room

agent_instructions_summary: Build a complete, fully functional AOL-style chat room system with Windows 95 aesthetic. Focus on nostalgia, simplicity, and real-time functionality. The IM windows are the most important feature - make them perfect! Include all sound effects, buddy lists, user profiles, and moderation tools. Test thoroughly with multiple users.
